channel.title: Vmware - 标签 - 线偶的IT笔记
channel.description: Vmware - 标签 | 线偶的IT笔记

item.title: vmware 一些设置
item.author: 线偶
item.description: 1. enable enhanced keyboard 2. enable back/forward mouse buttons in vmwarepath : somepath/Virtual Machines/Ubuntu 64-bit/*.vmx 1 2 usb.generic.allowHID = "TRUE" mouse.vusb.enable = "TRUE" reference Back / Forward mouse buttons do not work in VMWare
